lines.text: I have to be convincing and I've never been raped.
We should all be so lucky.
Rape... I should be so lucky.

[Referring to a conjugal visit from his wife]
The day I'm reduced to making love in here is the day I give up.
How does that joke go? Ah, the guy says, "so help me, I'll rape you." And the girl says, "so rape me, I'll help you."
So... rape me, I'll help you.
Goddamn it you come popping in here to borrow my wife... She ain't a lawnmower!
You're right Spence, and I admit I was outta line before. I don't know where the hell I got the guts to ask your lady to pose as a whore. But I swear to you, this time it's nothing.
What do want her to do?
